message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper focuses on building effective recommender systems for fashion, which involves visual signals and image representations. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also discusses training the image representation and the recommender system jointly, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). Information retrieval (cs.IR) is also relevant as the paper discusses recommending items to users based on their personal taste. Multimedia (cs.MM) is another possible category as the paper deals with visual signals and generating new images. Finally, artificial intelligence (cs.AI) is a broad category that encompasses all the topics discussed in the paper.
